name: dapr-example-pubsub
description: An example utilizing the Dapr JS SDK to invoke a service

scripts.start:dapr-grpc: dapr run --app-id example-pubsub --app-port 50051 --app-protocol grpc --components-path ./components npm run start
scripts.start:dapr-http: dapr run --app-id example-pubsub --app-port 50051 --app-protocol http --components-path ./components npm run start
